TextView.android:text: Thank you for installing the Cacophonometer. The application will automatically make audio recordings every hour and upload them to the Cacophony Project data server (http://138.68.237.249:8888) . This will allow us to monitor the birdsong near your device. To use this app you will first need to register on the data server and create a group. You can then enter this group name into this app. You are then ready to press the 'Setup Device' button to configure the app: 1) register the phone with your group, 2) get the GPS location and 3) select if you are using a SIM/Mobile data connection or not. Once recordings have been sent to the server you will be able to log back in and listen to them - as will anyone who has your password. We intend to perform automatic/machine analysis of all recordings rather than have a human listen to each recording. We also expect to implement a system to automatically remove any speech present in the recordings. If you believe you have inadvertently recorded a private conversation, please use the delete function on the server to remove it. Thank you again for supporting The Cacophony Project https://cacophony.org.nz/
